mapper.select: SELECT faq.id , faq.deleted , faq.created_at as createdAt , faq.modified_at as modifiedAt , faq.title , faq.content , faq.user_id as userId , user.username as userUsername FROM faq LEFT JOIN user ON faq.user_id = user.id WHERE faq.id = #{id}
SELECT faq.id FROM faq WHERE faq.id is not NULL AND faq.deleted = #{deleted} AND faq.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT faq.id FROM faq WHERE faq.id is not NULL AND faq.deleted = #{deleted} AND faq.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY faq.created_at ORDER BY faq.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
SELECT count(faq.id) as listsize FROM faq WHERE faq.id is not NULL AND faq.deleted = #{deleted} AND faq.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
